Package: de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.layout.camel

[Groovy] Class LayoutComponent

          • de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.layout.camel.LayoutComponent

          • Apache Camel Component for the layout engine. Properties will be given as strings and are also stored in their requred types. these will be feed into the Layout object

            See Also:
            UriEndpointComponent
            Authors:
            cmahnke
